title: Why is our Team removed from Battlegrounds?
body:
Yesterday our enemy Hamburg Towers didnt arrived because they were busy. We send a screenshot to this email: battlegrounds_de@riotgames.zendesk.com
They told us in a email that we had to send it to this email. But today i just saw our Team "Fck Lutschiano" hasn't won. As you can see we didn't even be there yesterday too. But we were!!! So i dont know why we aren't in the next round!!!
We asked why, but we didn't really got a response! They said its all discussed with our team leader, which didnt even talked to anyone of them. So why?

replies.body:
Da du hier im deutschen Forum bist und der Battleground Länderintern ist schlage ich vor du schreibst lieber Deutsch auch wenn man das übersetzen kann, macht einfach mehr Sinn
lg Fire Rider
